long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this plugin you’ll be able to :
update logo to your very own brand logo
change all of the basic colors of Hubspot's platform (menu, buttons, texts…)
rename texts in menu labels (such as Contacts, Sales, Automation…)
hide & rename texts in footer as you see fit
customize the HubSpot Service Hub UI to your liking without using a code editor
That plugin enables HubSpot platform to behave the way you want and to unify your tools with your very own brand and identity.
Dealing with support software frequently takes up the entire day and requires you to work on tickets for hours on end. Choose your preferred Mode in Chrome and enjoy all the benefits.
